name: CalendarDatePicker
desc: Displays a grid of days for a given month and allows the user to select a date.

fields.name: initialDate
fields.desc: The initially selected [DateTime] that the picker should display.

fields.name: firstDate
fields.desc: The earliest allowable [DateTime] that the user can select.

fields.name: lastDate
fields.desc: The latest allowable [DateTime] that the user can select.

fields.name: currentDate
fields.desc: The [DateTime] representing today. It will be highlighted in the day grid.

fields.name: onDateChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user selects a date in the picker.

fields.name: onDisplayedMonthChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user navigates to a new month/year in the picker.

fields.name: initialCalendarMode
fields.desc: The initial display of the calendar picker.

fields.name: selectableDayPredicate
fields.desc: Function to provide full control over which dates in the calendar can be selected.
